CardData.Name: Static Shock
CardData.Description: When attacked, you reflect 30% of the damage back to the attacker. This buff lasts for 2 turns.

CardData.Name: Enraged
CardData.Description: Attack the enemy to deal 35 damage. On your next turn, your attack power increases proportional to your lost HP.

CardData.Name: Shield Wall
CardData.Description: The next two single-target attacks directed at your allies will be redirected to you. Draw 1 card. If you die while buff is active, discard 2 cards.

CardData.Name: Ground Slam
CardData.Description: Attack the enemy for 20 damage. Apply Wound to ALL  enemies for one turn.
